heading: Tuesday Night
text: Clear, except some high clouds in New Hampshire. Areas of fog or freezing fog overnight. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, some mid 20s in northern cold hollows. Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly sunny after any morning fog, then clouds increasing late in the far south. Highs in the low to mid 50s. Northeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Variable clouds, then increasing late in New York, and near the Massachusetts border. Chance of late-night showers in New York. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, with some upper 30s far south, and in the broad valleys west. Winds becoming light, variable to east.
